scripts.say: There are no special observations from “Key Point G”... and… Eagle Union’s special task force is intercepting the target.
It appears that “Key Point G” is secretly sending a signal which has attracted these wasps.
Executor-class ships have been deployed to the target area. Even though they’re older models, they should be able to handle the situation.
What do you mean “should be”? That wishy-washy wording is not in our vocabulary...
Don’t underestimate them, let’s prioritize the search and rescue first...
As for those Eagle Union cowgirls... they can be used for our new combat test… two birds with one stone.
Understood, starting to accordingly divert our resources immediately.
So… “Key Point G”… How can I seduce you again this time around? Hehehe...
